Mustang Lounge East.Name: Mustang Lounge East
Mustang Lounge East.Content: A designated student lounge and is not available to reserve for events. Large event requests for the use of both the West lounge and East lounge will be considered on a case by case basis, and subject to labour charges to remove the existing furnishings.

Centre Spot.Name: Centre Spot
Centre Spot.Content: This is the content for room 3

InfoSource.Name: InfoSource
InfoSource.Content: The USC InfoSource is a campus information centre offering students and the Western community valuable service in a welcomed environment.

The Spoke.Name: The Spoke
The Spoke.Content: Located in the heart of Western University's campus, The Spoke is the place to dine and socialize. Proudly owned and operated by the University Students' Council, we are a business that is run by students for students.

Mustang Lounge West.Name: Mustang Lounge West
Mustang Lounge West.Content: A designated student lounge and is not available to reserve for events. Large event requests for the use of both the West lounge and East lounge will be considered on a case by case basis, and subject to labour charges to remove the existing furnishings.

Bathroom Mustang.Name: Bathroom Mustang
Bathroom Mustang.Content: This is a bathroom in Mustang Lounge.

Booster Juice.Name: Booster Juice
Booster Juice.Content: A juice and smoothie bar dedicated to providing you with a premium smoothie experience!

Digital USC Services 265.Name: Digital USC Services 265
Digital USC Services 265.Content: This is the USC Digital Serbices Office

Graphic Services.Name: Graphic Services
Graphic Services.Content: Graphic Services is one of four operations belonging to Western Retail Services. Owned and operated by the University, Graphic Services’ revenues are returned to Western for student programs and facilities. Graphic Services has been in operation since May, 1974.
Graphic Services.Hours:
Monday to Friday 8:30 am to 4:30 pm; 
 Closed Saturday, Sunday and University Holidays

Gazette 263.Name: Gazette 263
Gazette 263.Content: The Gazette is the official student newspaper at Western University in London, Ontario. The Gazette publishes online daily. We are one of the largest student newspapers in Canada, with an editorial board consisting of 18 editors and two full-time editorial staff.

Mustang Lounge & Fireplace Lounge.Name: Mustang Lounge & Fireplace Lounge
Mustang Lounge & Fireplace Lounge.Content: The Mustang Lounge is located on the main floor of the University Community Centre (UCC) and is available for your convention, ballroom, tradeshow, job fair, formal, etc.

Off-Campus Resource Centre 270.Name: Off-Campus Resource Centre 270
Off-Campus Resource Centre 270.Content: Welcome to Western's Off-Campus Housing Service! The Off-Campus Housing Service strives to provide students and staff a variety of housing options with over 5,000 listings annually.

CHRW 250.Name: CHRW 250
CHRW 250.Content: Founded in 1981, CHRW aims to provide a voice to Western and London communities. We are deeply-rooted in developing capacity in our communities through volunteerism and training.

McKeller Room 290.Name: McKeller Room 290
McKeller Room 290.Content: The McKellar Room is located on the second floor of the University Community Centre (UCC) and is available to book for your next speaker, panel discussion, film screening, meeting, training day, etc.

The Wave.Name: The Wave
The Wave.Content: The Wave Restaurant and Bar has been serving the students and faculty of Western University for over 20 years, under the umbrella of the University Students Council.

Careers & Experience Centre 210.Name: Careers & Experience Centre 210
Careers & Experience Centre 210.Content: Careers & Experience helps students deepen their academic learning and actively plan for personal and professional growth through career education, experiential learning, and industry exploration. We foster an environment in which students are able to discover their potential and design their future.

Community Room 269.Name: Community Room 269
Community Room 269.Content: The Community Room is located on the second floor of the University Community Centre (UCC) and is available to book for your teams next meeting, luncheon, conference, panel, interview, team building activity, brainstorm, etc.

USC Main Office 340.Name: USC Main Office 340
USC Main Office 340.Content: The University Students’ Council (USC) is a student-led organization that first and foremost exists to advocate for and represent undergraduate students at Western University. Each day, we work to support, improve and enhance your student experience, because we believe that students have the power to change the world.

Bookstore Western.Name: Bookstore Western
Bookstore Western.Content: The Book Store is located in the lower level of the University Community Centre.

Grocery Store 73.Name: Grocery Store 73
Grocery Store 73.Content: Grocery Checkout Fresh Market - University of Western Ontario, Located on the lower level of the UC

Lifetouch Photography 79.Name: Lifetouch Photography 79
Lifetouch Photography 79.Content: Your senior year is meant to be celebrated! Our goal is to ensure Seniors have a personalized, authentic, and fun photography session with us. We understand the importance of this once-in-a-lifetime experience and capturing YOU and your personality to commemorate this milestone.

Peersupport 76.Name: Peersupport 76
Peersupport 76.Content: The centre is a safe space in which students can express their feelings and explore resource options provided by the university, the city of London, and the USC
Peersupport 76.Hours: The centre is open every week Monday-Friday 10:00AM – 4:00PM during the academic year.

Smooth Wax Bar 80.Name: Smooth Wax Bar 80
Smooth Wax Bar 80.Content: Welcome to Smooth Wax Bar, the original wax bar in London and Toronto's Liberty Village!

Western Chiropractic 49.Name: Western Chiropractic 49
Western Chiropractic 49.Content: At Western Chiropractic, we are committed to providing every patient with exceptional care in a compassionate and friendly atmosphere.
Western Chiropractic 49.Hours:
Monday - Friday: 8:30AM - 6:30PM 
 Saturday - Sunday: By Appointment Only

Life Labs 34A.Name: Life Labs 34A
Life Labs 34A.Content: LifeLabs is a Canadian-owned company that has been serving the healthcare needs of Canadians for more than 50 years

Campus Tours 53.Name: Campus Tours 53
Campus Tours 53.Content: Current Western students will guide you around campus to help you truly understand what it’s like to live, learn and play here. Tours will take approximately two hours and 15 minutes.

Food Support Services 40F.Name: Food Support Services 40F
Food Support Services 40F.Content: The centre is a safe space in which students can express their feelings and explore resource options provided by the university, the city of London, and the USC.
Food Support Services 40F.Hours: Monday - Friday 10am-3pm, extended hours until 5pm on Wednesdays.

UCC Dental.Name: UCC Dental
UCC Dental.Content: Here at UCC Dental your satisfaction and comfort is our top priority. Our dentists and hygienists are dedicated to working with you to provide the optimum in oral health care.

Pharmacy.Name: Pharmacy
Pharmacy.Content: You’ve come to the right place for a quick, professional prescription service… and Western On-Campus Pharmacy now operates a FULL SERVICE post office on location.
